name: Event Photography
about: Essentially, the purpose of photography is to communicate and document moments in time. When you take a photograph and share it with others, you're showing a moment that was frozen through a picture.

name: Portrait Photography
about: Portrait photography is one of the most popular genres of photography, with good reason. Good portrait photographers are able to capture the personality.

name: Food & Drink Photography
about: When it’s time to capture the perfect bite, it’s important to have the right people behind the camera. A professional photographer can showcase your delicious.
